name: egomaniacally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows someone is extremely interested in and concerned about themselves, or considers themselves to be much more important than anyone else: He egomaniacally named the company after himself. I have never met such an egomaniacally self-absorbed person. Related word
egomaniacal
More examplesFewer examplesThe crew were finding it difficult to deal with the egomaniacally ambitious director.She egomaniacally pushed her way to the top of the company.The president seems to be egomaniacally obsessed with how others perceive him.She seemed to be egomaniacally unable to think of anyone but herself.He egomaniacally regarded his children as just smaller versions of himself.
